title: [Medicine] In this interim report of the phase 1 and phase 2 randomized placebo-controlled trials of Chinaâ€™s Sinopharm inactivated COVID-19 vaccine, patients had a low rate of adverse reactions and demonstrated immunogenicity, with neutralizing antibodies to coronavirus. (JAMA, 13 August 2020)

[Medicine] Researchers have developed a single-step, single-tube reverse transcription loop-mediated isothermal amplification assay for rapid detection of SARS-CoV-2 RNA that can diagnose COVID-19 in 20 min. Assay evaluation revealed assay sensitivity and specificity of 87 and 100%, respectively.
